title: Women's Auburn Wavy Wig with Bangs Middle Length Synthetic Wigs for Daily Use or Costume (Auburn)
description: * Hair Style: Middle Length Auburn Wavy Wig with Bangs  * More Choice: We have different style and color for your need, you can find your favorite wig here for your cosplay, costume party, daily use, dating, photo, Halloween, etc. or just for fun. * Please use and store it properly 1. First comb the hair with your hand or comb to make the wig natural. 2. Do not to blow dry the hair with a high setting since otherwise the knots may be damaged or split, please just let the wig air-dry or in low temperature and brush hair after it is completely dry. 3.Do not sleeping with the wig wear on and put the wigs on the wig stand for storage when you not wear it. 4. Do not wash the wig frequent, wash your wig about every 3 weeks or 2 weeks in the summer. 5. Wash and care using a little mild shampoo and conditioner in cold water or warm water. * Warm Tips: 1. Not to spray gel water and wax on the wig,which will cause the wig oily.  2. All Synthetic Hair Wigs Be Happened To Minimum Shedding And Tangling Which Is Normal.  3. Color Sometimes may be a little different From the photos because of your computer monitor's color setting or other reasons.
